title: mirall-1.2.1: cmake error at doc/cmake_install.cmake:36 (file): file install cannot find "/root/mirall-build/doc/html".
body:
hello,

running make install after a successfull build, i get the following error:

loki mirall-build # make install
[ 17%] built target owncloudsync
[ 58%] built target mirall
[100%] built target owncloud
install the project...
-- install configuration: "debug"
-- installing: /usr/local/etc/sync-exclude.lst

-- removed runtime path from "/usr/local/lib64/libowncloudsync.so.1.2.1"
-- installing: /usr/local/share/applications/owncloud.desktop
-- installing: /usr/local/share/icons/hicolor/48x48/apps/mirall.png

make: *** [install] fehler 1

regards,
norman
